name: embeddedlsp
description: embedded js and css in c# language features

scripts.install: npm run compile && npm run package && npm run clear-old-versions && npm run installVsixFile
scripts.patch-local: npm run compile && npm version patch && npm run package && npm run clear-old-versions && npm run installVsixFile
scripts.minor-local: npm run compile && npm version minor && npm run package && npm run clear-old-versions && npm run installVsixFile
scripts.mayor-local: npm run compile && npm version mayor && npm run package && npm run clear-old-versions && npm run installVsixFile

author: Alexander Wedekind
